alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 6:34PM PST until February 23 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Southeastern Elko County, Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
